title: Witch Hunter

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
Boilerplate- (Night) Target two players. Attacks used by one will be redirected to the other.
Bewitch- (Night) Choose a word that is at least seven letters long that is not used to refer to a player (host discretion). The first player to use that word the next day, regardless of alignment, will be instantly hit with an Overkill attack.
Mob Mentality!- (Night) [Cheat] Target a player. If no lynch occurs the next day and this player has at least two non-Cog votes, they will be lynched.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-A Boilerplated player will know their attack was redirected.
-The same word may not be used twice for Bewitch.
-The death message for the player killed by Bewitch should not include the cause of death.
